and you shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> for the <S%H5262>libation,<s%> one-fourth of a <S%H1969>hin,<s%> with the <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> for the <S%H2077>sacrifice,<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H3532>lamb.<s%>

<S%H176>'Or<s%> for a <S%H352>ram<s%> you shall <S%H6213>prepare<s%> as a grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> two-tenths [of an ephah] of <S%H5560>fine<s%> <S%H5560>flour<s%> <S%H1101>mixed<s%> with one-third of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H8081>oil;<s%>
and for the <S%H5262>libation<s%> you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> one-third of a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%> as a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

and you shall <S%H7126>offer<s%> as the <S%H5262>libation<s%> one-half a <S%H1969>hin<s%> of <S%H3196>wine<s%> as an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire,<s%> as a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H3602>'Thus<s%> it shall be <S%H6213>done<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H7794>ox,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> for <S%H259>each<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> for each of the <S%H3532>male<s%> <S%H7716>lambs,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> of the <S%H5795>goats.<s%>

<S%H3605>'All<s%> who are <S%H249>native<s%> shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things<s%> in <S%H3602>this<s%> <S%H3602>manner,<s%> in <S%H7126>presenting<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire,<s%> as a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'And <S%H3588>if<s%> an <S%H1616>alien<s%> <S%H1481>sojourns<s%> with you, <S%H176>or<s%> one <S%H834>who<s%> may be <S%H8432>among<s%> you throughout your <S%H1755>generations,<s%> and he [wishes to] <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire,<s%> as a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H9201>just<s%> as you <S%H6213>do,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> he shall <S%H6213>do.<s%>

'There is to be <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8451>law<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4941>ordinance<s%> for you and for the <S%H1616>alien<s%> who <S%H1481>sojourns<s%> with you.' "
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, 'When you <S%H935>enter<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> I <S%H935>bring<s%> you,
then it shall be, that when you <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H3899>food<s%> of the <S%H776>land,<s%> you shall <S%H7311>lift<s%> up an <S%H8641>offering<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

'Of the <S%H7225>first<s%> of your <S%H6182>dough<s%> you shall <S%H7311>lift<s%> up a <S%H2471>cake<s%> as an <S%H8641>offering;<s%> as the <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H1637>threshing<s%> <S%H1637>floor,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> you shall <S%H7311>lift<s%> it up.
'From the <S%H7225>first<s%> of your <S%H6182>dough<s%> you shall <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> an <S%H8641>offering<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations.<s%>

'But <S%H3588>when<s%> you <S%H7686>unwittingly<s%> <S%H7368>fail<s%> and do not <S%H6213>observe<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H4687>commandments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%>

[even] <S%H3605>all<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you <S%H3027>through<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>gave<s%> <S%H6680>commandment<s%> and <S%H1973>onward<s%> throughout your <S%H1755>generations,<s%>

then it shall be, <S%H518>if<s%> it is <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H7684>unintentionally,<s%> <S%H4480>without<s%> the <S%H5869>knowledge<s%> of the <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> that <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6499>bull<s%> <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> for a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> as a <S%H5207>soothing<s%> <S%H7381>aroma<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> with its grain <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and its <S%H5262>libation,<s%> according to the <S%H4941>ordinance,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H8163>male<s%> <S%H5795>goat<s%> for a <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering.<s%>

'Then the <S%H3548>priest<s%> shall <S%H3722>make<s%> <S%H3722>atonement<s%> for <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and they shall be <S%H5545>forgiven;<s%> for it was an <S%H7684>error,<s%> and they have <S%H935>brought<s%> their <S%H7133>offering,<s%> an <S%H801>offering<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and their <S%H9128>sin<s%> <S%H9128>offering<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> for their <S%H7684>error.<s%>

'So <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> will be <S%H5545>forgiven,<s%> with the <S%H1616>alien<s%> who <S%H1481>sojourns<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them, for [it happened] to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> through <S%H7684>error.<s%>

<S%H3588>'Because<s%> he has <S%H959>despised<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and has <S%H6565>broken<s%> His <S%H4687>commandment,<s%> that <S%H5315>person<s%> shall be <S%H3772>completely<s%> <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off;<s%> his <S%H5771>guilt<s%> [shall be] on him.' "

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H559>tell<s%> them that they shall <S%H6213>make<s%> for themselves <S%H6734>tassels<s%> on the <S%H3671>corners<s%> of their <S%H899>garments<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations,<s%> and that they shall <S%H5414>put<s%> on the <S%H6734>tassel<s%> of each <S%H3671>corner<s%> a <S%H6616>cord<s%> of <S%H8504>blue.<s%>
